title: Not seeing +Gold after a CS
body:
So, I've had this issue since reinstalling League a while back, where I can't see the gold gain after last hitting a minion/tower, etc.

I can see gold exploding from them, but I don't get the "+32" or w/e message.
And it kinda messes with me a lot :(

I've tried going to defaults on all my settings, deleting my config, etc. Nothing has worked.

Edit :< I have two accounts with the same exact settings, except one can see the gold gains, and the other can't.

replies.body:
The server-side settings for the account not seeing the gold values gain may be corrupt. I recommend completing a reset of these settings with the steps below.

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your install folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder named **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the match, then hop into another custom match to confirm the changes have saved and that everything is now default. Let me know if this helped!
